message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60 and you get $40. Take it or leave it.
Alice, your offer wasn't unfair, but let's make this quick and easy. A 50/50 split seems like the most straightforward solution.
Bob, my friend, time is money! Let's settle this now.  I'll take a slight hit at $55, you get $45.  It's a good deal considering the circumstances!
